rows.label: qst200415_msg0001
rows.name:
The wound indicates... a
single, deadly blade strike.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0002
rows.name: No signs of struggle...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0003
rows.name: A one-hit kill?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0004
rows.name:
I doubt she was even
aware of any danger.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0005
rows.name:
The deed was perpetrated by
a professional killer...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0006
rows.name:
That's awful... What was the
point in killing her...?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0007
rows.name:
...You. Scum. How long will
you skulk in the shadows?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0008
rows.name:
My, my... The Heartless Judge. How
long's it been...twenty-odd years?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0009
rows.name: As I live and breathe...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0010
rows.name:
I wondered which Blade could be
giving a ruthless band of assassins
like my Bloody Lobsters trouble...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0011
rows.name:
But I never expected that
Blade would be you!

rows.label: qst200415_msg0012
rows.name:
Causing you trouble? What
are you talking about?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0013
rows.name: Ha! Now you're trying to play dumb?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0014
rows.name:
You capturing our employers put
paid to our finely-crafted
moneymaking scheme, you know.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0016
rows.name:
You've made it clear that you wanted
to wash your hands of our enterprise,
damn you! So why come back now?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0017
rows.name:
Could it be that you actually
miss the killing? Eh, mister
Heartless Judge?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0018
rows.name: ...You claim to know my old self, scum?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0019
rows.name:
I recognize neither you,
nor that "Heartless Judge"
sobriquet you keep using.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0020
rows.name:
I stake no claim to the power over
life and death, and I renounce killing.
I am not the Vasara you knew.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0021
rows.name: Heheh... Bwahahaha!

rows.label: qst200415_msg0022
rows.name:
The man who's killed women and
children without batting an
eyelid now renounces killing?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0023
rows.name: Gahahahaha! The irony is too delicious!

rows.label: qst200415_msg0024
rows.name:
...I assume this is your handiwork.
Why did you kill the woman?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0025
rows.name: ...Why?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0026
rows.name:
I'm getting paid for it. What
other reason do I need?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0027
rows.name:
Your employers have been caught and
judged, by me. There is no paycheck
waiting for you. Is that not so?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0028
rows.name:
Hey now, aren't you
forgetting something?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0029
rows.name:
Whatever the reason, once you enter
a contract, you have to do the deed.
That's the rule, remember?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0030
rows.name:
Reputation is everything
in this world. Or have you
forgotten that too...?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0031
rows.name:
It's a shame, seeing as you used to be
the one who killed not for pay or glory,
but because you liked it so much.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0032
rows.name:
Man, people sure can change... Oh
yeah, but you're a Blade, right?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0033
rows.name: ...Have you said your piece?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0034
rows.name:
Chill out, Vasara. This
was just a warning.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0035
rows.name:
This is what's gonna happen
if you keep meddling with
our work. Got it?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0036
rows.name:
You'd better keep it in
mind, Vasara the Pacifist.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0037
rows.name: What a weirdo...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0038
rows.name:
Judging by the technique however,
he is a capable swordsman.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0039
rows.name:
Certainly not a foe to
be taken lightly...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0041
rows.name: Vasara! Where're you going?!

rows.label: qst200415_msg0042
rows.name: Isn't it obvious...? I'm giving chase.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0043
rows.name: That man cannot remain at large...

rows.label: qst200415_msg0044
rows.name:
You're gonna avenge Ellenora,
is that it? And alone, again?

rows.label: qst200415_msg0045
rows.name:
The man's grudge is against me,
and me alone. There is no need
for you to get involved.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0046
rows.name:
Vasara... This has ceased to be your
problem. It's our problem now.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0049
rows.name:
One that we must join
forces in solving.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0050
rows.name:
That's right, Vasara!
Let us give you a hand!

rows.label: qst200415_msg0051
rows.name: ...Very well.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0052
rows.name: Do as you wish, then.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0053
rows.name:
Great! Now that's settled, we should
find out more about that mook.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0054
rows.name:
It might make sense to task the
mercenaries with collecting
intel on the Bloody Lobsters.

rows.label: qst200415_msg0055
rows.name:
If we can predict their next
move, we should be able to stop
them with Vasara's aid...
